Source.Name: libchamplain
Source.Description: libchamplain is a C library providing a ClutterActor to display maps. It also provides a Gtk+ widget to display maps in Gtk+ applications. Python and Perl bindings are also available. It supports numerous free map sources such as OpenStreetMap, OpenCycleMap, OpenAerialMap and Maps for free.
